1: I seek your attention and trust in my sincere prayer.
2: I seek fairness and truth in all I do.
3: I am committed to speaking only positively and truthfully.
4: I choose wisdom to guide my actions and paths.
5: I walk confidently on the right path.
6: I call to you, and you listen to me.
7: I experience wonderful kindness and protection through trusting in love.
8: I am cherished and protected in a safe embrace.
9: I rise above those who seek to oppress me.
10: I speak with confidence and embrace my own strength.
11: I remain focused and uplifted despite distractions around me.
12: I seek opportunities with courage and determination.
13: I seek strength and guidance to overcome challenges.
14: I cherish the blessings of abundance and support for future generations.
15: I find joy in seeing goodness and becoming more like it.
